youtube.title: Understanding Period Cramps: Uterine Contractions Explained
youtube.description: Discover the science behind period cramps in this detailed medical animation. We show how the uterus contracts to shed the endometrial lining during menstruation. Learn why it happens and the biology behind the pain. Subscribe for more easy-to-understand health education!
